lg.l: I still think of those days now and then

My first DHSIThe Digital Humanities Summer Institute, a training event for people working in the Digital Humanties, has been held annually at the University of Victoria, BC, Canada since 2001. See https://dhsi.org, accessed 10 June 2022.

And the cluster housingParticipants usually stay in on-campus accommodation. Cluster housing units have four bedrooms, and participants often advertise for housemates befire DHSI starts. See https://dhsi.org/accommodation, accessed 10 June 2022.

Read some tweets from jotis13Dr Jessica Otis (Twitter handle @jotis13) as well as being a prolific DHSI tweeter has also analysed patterns of tweeting during DHSI. See https://jessicaotis.com/digital-humanities/rise-and-fall-of-the-dhsi-twitterati/, accessed 10 June 2022.

Pass the ferns, spot a deerVarious flora and fauna can be spotted on campus. Previous DHSI participants have made Twitter accounts for @DHSI_fern, @DHSI_Deer, @DHSIPinecone, @DHSI_Bunny, @DHSI_Raven, and @DHSI_Crow, among others.
How to program in R R is a programming language and environment optimised for statistical analysis and producing graphs. See https://www.r-project.org/, accessed 10 June 2022.
When I finally got it installed
With an expert to help me along

sp.p: You’re making me feel I was there too.
Maybe you were. Make it part of your story.

lg.l: It was hot, not a cloud in the sky
Then a crow caught my eye

Coming from MacLaurin"So I was walking away from MacLaurin, & this dude flew past me from behind…almost as if they were coming from MacLaurin too.… It’s @dhsi_crow—they *were* in the auditorium! #DHSI19", Tweet from Maria Chappell (@MariaAChappell), 15 June 2019, https://twitter.com/MariaAChappell/status/1139645641297190912, accessed 10 June 2022
There were trees, but he dodged in between
Then he spied the Nanaimo bar next to my cupA quintessentially Canadian three-layer slice. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nanaimo_bar, accessed 10 June 2022.
And he started to hop towards–
So I stuffed the last piece in my mouth

sp.p: You didn’t have to. I remember!

lg.l: With my laptop in hand I was gone

sp.p: AlyssaAlyssa Arbuckle, Co-director DHSI. See https://www.alyssaarbuckle.com/
